dcterms:creator: Saizheng Zhang
Emily Dinan
Jack Urbanek
Arthur Szlam
Douwe Kiela
Jason Weston
dcterms:description: The Persona-Chat dataset consists of conversations between crowdworkers who were randomly paired and asked to act the part of a given provided persona, resulting in interesting and engaging conversations that learning agents can try to mimic.
dcterms:title: Persona-Chat

dcterms:creator: Saizheng Zhang
Emily Dinan
Jack Urbanek
Arthur Szlam
Douwe Kiela
Jason Weston
dcterms:description: The ConvAI2 dataset is based on the Persona-Chat dataset and is publicly available in ParlAI, containing conversations that aim to model normal conversation when two interlocutors first meet and get to know each other.
dcterms:title: ConvAI2
